scriptmanager.util

Class FASTAUtilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • scriptmanager.util.FASTAUtilities

  • public class FASTAUtilities
extends java.lang.Object
    Utilities for sequence manipulation.
    Author:
    William KM Lai
    See Also:
    FilterforPIPseq, DNAShapefromBED, FASTAExtract

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean isValidIUPACString(java.lang.String motif)
      Perform regex validation ("[ATGCRYSWKMBDHVN]+") of motif string, capitalization INsensitive, to ensure that only IUPAC DNA nucleotide characters are used in the motif search.
      static boolean parseStringforInvalideNuc(java.lang.String seq)
      Determine if String contains invalid DNA sequence chars other than [ATGC] (as of yet unused).
      static java.lang.String RevComplement(java.lang.String SEQ)
      Return the reverse complement DNA sequence of the input string (skipping over non-[ATCGN] char) and where rev complement of N is N.

    • Method Detail

      • RevComplement

        public static java.lang.String RevComplement(java.lang.String SEQ)
        Return the reverse complement DNA sequence of the input string (skipping over non-[ATCGN] char) and where rev complement of N is N.

        Consider switching to HTSJDK implementation after considering edge case handling
        Parameters:
        SEQ - the DNA sequence string to get the rev complement of
        Returns:
        the rev complement of SEQ

      • parseStringforInvalideNuc

        public static boolean parseStringforInvalideNuc(java.lang.String seq)
        Determine if String contains invalid DNA sequence chars other than [ATGC] (as of yet unused).
        Parameters:
        seq - the DNA sequence to check
        Returns:
        true if seq only contains [ATCG], false if seq contains any other characters

      • isValidIUPACString

        public static boolean isValidIUPACString(java.lang.String motif)
        Perform regex validation ("[ATGCRYSWKMBDHVN]+") of motif string, capitalization INsensitive, to ensure that only IUPAC DNA nucleotide characters are used in the motif search.
        Parameters:
        motif - some IUPAC motif string to check
        Returns:
        false if non-IUPAC chars are in the motif String, else true
